title: Beckoning of the Blooded
description: Stolen from the Court of Moon, Milana finds herself in strange company. Company she never thought she’d be in again. Axis has spun out of control, working for new king to keep his life. But he’s gone too far this time, and when the Dark King gets a hold him, he’ll wish he hadn’t taken the Dark Queen’s life into his own hands.The Dark King is spiraling within himself in the dark abyss of his own self-loathing. He knew he shouldn’t have let Milana go alone into the kingdom. But he had. And now she’s gone. Eurelia speaks prophecy, as if it’ll cure what ails him, but it will not.Not until his queen is returned.The Dark Queen must forge down a path no one saw coming in this third installment in the Promethean Fae Series. And it’s a path that could make or break the entire world. Not just the dimensions the Fae dwell within.
author: K.M. Mixon
